column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////I cannot remember the last time I sat down at a restaurant and enjoyed EVERYTHING! The food
column4: and the service was amazing! Terry is the most amazing server that was patient and talked to me about all of the appetizers and entrees I asked about! I opted to try some of his favorites and what do you know
column5: he did not disappoint!! I am sitting outside enjoying the weather (I know
column6: when can you say that is Houston?!?) and the awesome music they are playing.
